metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10515 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Redmine before 3.2.3, there are stored XSS vulnerabilities affecting Textile and Markdown text formatting, and project homepages.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.2.3-1
redmine-mysql - 3.2.3-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.2.3-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.2.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.3-1').
